content:
The provided document discusses various Panda3D GUI components and their customization options, including parameters for padding around geom or text, initial state management, frame textures, editing functionality, event suppression, render order, and text modification capabilities.

the geom or text ’s bounding box by
which to expand the default frame (Width,Height) state The initial state of the object NORMAL or DISABLED frameTexture Texture applied directly to the generated frame image filename or Texture object enableEdit Affects direct-gui-edit functionality 0 or 1 suppressKeys If 1, suppresses triggers of global keyboard-related Panda events
(not part of the GUI system) 0 or 1 suppressMouse If 1, suppresses triggers of global mouse-related Panda events (e.g.
camera controls) 0 or 1 sortOrder Specifies render order for overlapping objects. Higher numbers are
drawn in front of lower numbers. Number textMayChange Whether the text of an object can be changed after creation 0 or 1
